properties.areaDesc: Montgomery, MO; Gasconade, MO; Callaway, MO; Osage, MO; Lincoln, MO; Warren, MO
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:04PM CST until January 11 at 12:45AM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
At 1003 PM CST, Missouri Department of Transportation reported
Highway 94 was closed in Montgomery County. Up to three inches of
rain have already fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Missouri Department of Transportation.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage
and low lying areas.

Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Montgomery City, Hermann, Linn, Davis, New Florence, Jonesburg, Hawk
Point, Chamois, Bellflower, Westphalia, Big Spring, Mount Sterling,
Mineola, Gasconade, High Hill, Rhineland, Morrison, Truxton,
McKittrick and Cave.

Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the
warned area.

This also includes Deutschheim Historic Site.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.

NWSheadline: THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN...MONTGOMERY...EAST CENTRAL CALLAWAY... NORTHEASTERN OSAGE...NORTHWESTERN WARREN AND NORTHERN GASCONADE COUNTIES
